long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When adding a task to the calendar, all tasks have the same color.

With this plugin, a different color can be specified for each task.

If task name is ended color surrounded by square brackets (for example, [red]), the plugin will color it with that color.

You can also specify a hex value for the color, for example [#00ff00] for green.
